{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10199v1", "title": "Multipole Moments of Double Heavy $J^P = \frac{3}{2}^+$ Baryons", "summary": "In the present study, we calculate the multipole moments of spin-3/2 doubly
heavy baryons within the light cone QCD sum rules. We compare our results on
magnetic dipole moments with results existing in the literature. The results
obtained in the present work may be useful for a deeper understanding of the
properties of doubly heavy baryons as well as in the analysis of their strong
and electromagnetic decays.", "main_category": "hep-ph", "categories": "hep-ph", "published": "2025-04-14T13:03:16Z"}
